title: Crypto payment platform Alphapo breached, over $23M in crypto vanishes
description: Alphapo, a crypto payment platform, has been hacked and drained of $23 million in Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Tron. ZachXBT, a crypto analyst, identified and reported the loss from the platform’s hot wallets today. The attackers executed a complex attack on Alphapo’s hot wallets, giving them control over the user funds on numerous blockchains without authorization. ... Read more

title: How A Vertical AI Strategy Leverages the Full Potential of Generative AI
description: Generative AI has emerged as a groundbreaking technology, potentially revolutionizing industries. This advanced AI application enables machines to create and generate original content autonomously, marking a departure from traditional AI systems that rely on existing data. Generative AI trains deep learning models on vast amounts of data to identify patterns and correlations, producing highly realistic ... Read more

title: Bitcoin Continues to Soar as BRICS Bloc Attracts Over 40 New Nations
description: Interest in BRICS is expanding as more countries are now showing interest. The goal is to displace the US Dollar, a feat proponents believe Bitcoin can handle. The price of the leading cryptocurrency Bitcoin (BTC) continues to grow as the BRICS gains more attention from several nations. At the time of this writing, BTC was [...]
